weapon_description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."
weapon_skill_description: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, Lunar-Charged, Lunar-Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 40% for 12s.
